description: Complete system overview of the HTML/CSS rendering engine, including core components, architecture, and integration points
Detailed documentation of the core layout algorithms including block formatting, flex layout, table layout, and inline context processing
Documentation of CSS processing pipeline including selector matching, specificity calculation, property inheritance, and style application
Documentation of graphics rendering system including gradient generation, shadow effects, color processing, and image handling
Documentation of the document container architecture, resource management, and integration with Qt framework
